com.samsung.fastcast

Class RemoteController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.fastcast.RemoteController

  • public class RemoteController
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for remote controlling
    Author:
    m.gajewski

    • Method Detail

      • startPlayback

        public void startPlayback(int videoId,
                          long beginPosition)
        Sends message to remote device to start video playing on it.
        Parameters:
        videoId - ID of video to be played.
        beginPosition - Position in milliseconds where to start playing.

      • startPlayback

        public void startPlayback(int videoId,
                          long beginPosition,
                          java.lang.String JSONData)
        Sends message to remote device to start video playing on it. Use this version of method if you want add additional data argument to message sent to TV application
        Parameters:
        videoId - ID of video to be played.
        beginPosition - Position in milliseconds where to start playing.
        JSONData - Stringified JSON object with all data you need.

      • startPlayback

        public void startPlayback(int videoId,
                          long beginPosition,
                          JSONObject data)
        Sends message to remote device to start video playing on it. Use this version of method if you want add additional data argument to message sent to TV application
        Parameters:
        videoId - ID of video to be played.
        beginPosition - Position in milliseconds where to start playing.
        JSONData - JSONObject with all data you need.

      • playPause

        public void playPause()
        Sends PlayPause keycode to remote device

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Sends Stop keycode to remote device

      • fastForward

        public void fastForward()
        Sends Forward keycode to remote device

      • rewind

        public void rewind()
        Sends Rewind keycode to remote device

      • seek

        public void seek(long position)
        Sends seek to position message to remote device.
        Parameters:
        position - Position in milliseconds where to jump.

      • setVolume

        public void setVolume(int volume)
        Sends new volume value to remote device.
        Parameters:
        volume - new volume value. Negative value means mute at volume = abs(value).

      • reclaim

        public void reclaim()
        Sends Reclaim message to remote device. Remote device should back playback to this device by sending "play" message

      • keyDown

        public void keyDown(java.lang.String keycode)
        Sends custom keycode to remote device. Keycode should be string in W3C standard: http://www.w3.org/TR/DOM-Level-3-Events-code/
        Parameters:
        keycode - keycode to send to remote device
